arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers tells Celtic fans what REALLY got his back up as Tierney chant wasn't only crime in boss' eyes
arts.sum: The Hoops boss was also less than amused over the signing about Kieran Tierney from the stands
Watch highlights from the Scottish Premiership match between Celtic and St Mirren.

arts.ttl: Reason for Celtic vs St Mirren power outage explained
arts.sum: Celtic’s live broadcast of the game was affected.

arts.ttl: Nicolas Kuhn focused on trophies not stats as he discusses Celtic goalscoring return
arts.sum: Celtic winger Nicolas Kuhn is focusing on the team rather than individual targets.

arts.ttl: Chris Sutton laughs at Rangers and makes Celtic claim after Philippe Clement's side draw at Hibernian
arts.sum: Chris Sutton laughs at Rangers dropping points after Celtic win After bottling yet another game, Sutton couldn’t help but laugh on social media as he stated that ‘it’s ok beating Celtic but Rangers needed to back it up’, before telling everyone that he was off for a ‘lie down’.

arts.ttl: Rangers collapse sparks a Hotline earthquake as Celtic resume normal service over Clement's 'clowns'
arts.sum: Robbie Copeland takes your calls after Rangers instantly stumbled and Celtic stretched their lead to 13 points

arts.ttl: Rodgers '100 per cent' certain Celtic will strengthen as he reveals January plan
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers wants to strengthen his Celtic squad this month.

arts.ttl: Stephen Robinson sounds deflated with Celtic admission as St Mirren boss rues 'mistakes'
arts.sum: “I’ve been to Celtic many times and it’s like you’re defending constantly, they’re creating chances, your goalkeeper has to make 10-15 saves in the game and none of that really happened today. The Celtic boss was delighted with the win but St Mirren manager, Stephen Robinson, sounded gutted as he pointed out the mistakes that cost his team at Celtic Park .

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers accuses Celtic fans of 'disrespect' over chant about Kieran Tierney
arts.sum: The Hoops boss was left fuming at the shouts from the stands late on in the 3-0 win over St Mirren

arts.ttl: BBC commentator states what he witnessed at Celtic Park v St Mirren he has 'never' seen before
arts.sum: The same happened, for a few seconds, with BBC Radio Scotland’s service and lead commentator Lamont stating that he had ‘never’ witnessed such a situation at Celtic Park before. “Wow, a power cut, momentarily at Celtic Park,” said Lamont.
